name: Quillers Quest Demo
description:
This a Demo to receive feedback for the final version coming soon.

This game is a single player 2D platformer experience designed to those that want some simple fun. There is an edge of difficulty, but there is nothing not overcome able. However, there are plenty of challenges for those that want a bit more spice to their gameplay. 

This demo will provide 20-30 minutes to complete.

(Sound effects and music is still being worked on.)
